name: Mourning Song (Short Film DVD)
description:
A film by Jennifer Razon

Synopsis:
Juliette gave up her career as a musician. With the recent death of her husband, Michael, she is left alone. The heartache bears too much on the day that would have been Michael’s 35th birthday. With the support of her mother, Juliett is faced with trying to live her life again through music.

with Erin Hiatt, Lonna Montrose, Andrew Hernon

Running Time: 10 minutes

Features:
Movie
Scene Selection
Teaser Trailer
Production Stills

© 2007

name: Monica (Short Film DVD)
description:
A short film directed by Jennifer Razon

Synopsis:
It's a quiet and lonely night. William arrives at a nearly desolate diner right outside of town, where he is approached by a beautiful woman 
looking to strike up a conversation. The unlikely pair begin a friendship that gradually evolves to more than just nights of casual conversations and a few cups of coffee. But things aren't always what they appear to be.

with Bryan Brorby, Ruth Powell, Andy Allen, Megan Webster 

Running time: 18 minutes

Features:
Movie
Scene Selection

©2006

name: Children of Laguna (Softcover)
description:
Children of Laguna by Jennifer Razon

112pgs - Photography Book

The photographs in this book were taken from May 18th thru June 1st, 2008 during a trip to Nagcarlan, a small town in the province of Laguna, Philippines.

"Each day I saw their faces, each day I saw their smiles, through hardships and a small handful of possessions they have, I saw the genuine happiness in their eyes." -- Jennifer Razon

Please allow two weeks for delivery (per order) as each book is custom printed. Each book is also personally signed. Thanks!
